foreignData.name: Wächter der Himmelsfestung
foreignData.text:
Bonus {4} (Du kannst zusätzlich {4} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Fliegend, Verteidiger
Falls die Bonuskosten des Wächters der Himmelsfestung bezahlt wurden, kommt er mit zwei +1/+1-Marken ins Spiel.
Solange mindestens eine +1/+1-Marke auf dem Wächter der Himmelsfestung liegt, kann er angreifen, als ob er nicht Verteidiger hätte.

foreignData.name: Centinela de aerorruina
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {4}. (Puedes pagar {4} adicionales al lanzar este hechizo.)
Vuela, defensor.
Si la Centinela de aerorruina fue estimulada, entra al campo de batalla con dos contadores +1/+1 sobre ella.
Mientras la Centinela de aerorruina tenga un contador +1/+1 sobre ella, puede atacar como si no tuviera la habilidad de defensor.

foreignData.name: Sentinelle du fort céleste
foreignData.text:
Kick {4} (Vous pouvez payer {4} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Vol, défenseur
Si la Sentinelle du fort céleste a été kickée, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille avec deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle.
Tant que la Sentinelle du fort céleste a au moins un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle, elle peut attaquer comme si elle n'avait pas le défenseur.

foreignData.name: Sentinella dell'Enclave Celeste
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {4} (Puoi pagare {4} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Volare, difensore
Se la Sentinella dell'Enclave Celeste è stata potenziata, entra nel campo di battaglia con due segnalini +1/+1.
Fintanto che la Sentinella dell'Enclave Celeste ha un segnalino +1/+1, può attaccare come se non avesse difensore.

foreignData.name: スカイクレイブの歩哨
foreignData.text:
キッカー{4}（あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{4}を支払ってもよい。）
飛行、防衛
スカイクレイブの歩哨がキッカーされていたなら、これは＋１/＋１カウンターが２個置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
スカイクレイブの歩哨の上に＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれているかぎり、これは防衛を持たないかのように攻撃できる。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ガーゴイル

foreignData.name: 하늘거주지 보초병
foreignData.text:
키커 {4} (당신은 이 주문을 발동하면서 추가로 {4}를 지불할 수 있다.)
비행, 수비태세
하늘거주지 보초병의 키커 비용이 지불되었다면, 하늘거주지 보초병은 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다.
하늘거주지 보초병이 +1/+1 카운터를 가지고 있는 한, 하늘거주지 보초병은 수비태세가 없는 것처럼 공격할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Sentinela do Enclave Celeste
foreignData.text:
Reforçar {4} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {4} ao conjurar esta mágica.)
Voar, defensor
Se Sentinela do Enclave Celeste foi reforçada, ela entra no campo de batalha com dois marcadores +1/+1.
Enquanto Sentinela do Enclave Celeste tiver um marcador +1/+1, ela poderá atacar como se não tivesse defensor.

foreignData.name: Дозорный Небесного Анклава
foreignData.text:
Усилитель {4} (При разыгрывании этого заклинания вы можете дополнительно заплатить {4}.)
Полет, Защитник
Если Дозорный Небесного Анклава получил Усилитель, он выходит на поле битвы с двумя жетонами +1/+1 на нем.
Пока на Дозорном Небесного Анклава есть жетон +1/+1, он может атаковать, как если бы у него не было способности Защитника.

foreignData.name: 空境哨卫
foreignData.text:
增幅{4}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{4}。）
飞行，守军
如果空境哨卫已增幅，则它进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。
只要空境哨卫上有+1/+1指示物，它便能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

foreignData.name: 空境哨衛
foreignData.text:
增幅{4}（你施放此咒語時可以額外支付{4}。）
飛行，守軍
如果空境哨衛已增幅，則它進戰場時上面有兩個+1/+1指示物。
只要空境哨衛上有+1/+1指示物，它便能視同不具守軍異能地進行攻擊。

name: Skyclave Sentinel
originalText:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Flying, defender
If Skyclave Sentinel was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
As long as Skyclave Sentinel has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

rulings.text: Kicker represents an optional additional cost that you may choose to pay as you cast the spell. A spell cast with that additional cost paid is “kicked.”
You can’t pay a kicker cost more than once.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can’t kick it.

If you copy a kicked spell, the copy is also kicked. If a card or token enters the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that’s already on the battlefield, the new permanent isn’t kicked, even if the original was.

To determine a spell’s total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card’s effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

Some instant or sorcery spells require alternative or additional targets if they’re kicked. You ignore these targeting requirements if those spells aren’t kicked, and you can’t kick those spells unless you can choose the appropriate targets. On the other hand, you can kick a permanent spell even if you won’t be able to choose targets for an enters-the-battlefield ability of that permanent once the spell resolves.

An ability that triggers when a player casts a kicked spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
